name: Fatal Inertia EX Trial Version Upgrade
name_original: Fatal Inertia EX Trial Version Upgrade
description:
The Fatal Inertia EX Trial Version Upgrade gives you access to the full version of Fatal Inertia EX. The free Trial Version must first be downloaded and installed prior to using the Trial Version Upgrade.

Full Version Features:
• Multiplayer Action! Compete online with up to 8 players or offline with 2-player split-screen.
• Unconventional weapons that follow realistic principles of physics and magnetism ensure you'll never see the same thing twice.
• Beautiful and Varied Worlds - Over 50 race courses span 7 stunning locations.
• Over 1.3 million customization combinations plus 15,000 performance combinations.
• DUALSHOCK®3 compatible and optional SIXAXIS™ support.
